info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 09 at 5:41PM MST until August 09 at 6:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MST FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 541 PM MST, a dust channel was 7 miles northwest of Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads, or 33 miles east of Boulder City, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than one quarter mile with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists via webcam coming off of Red Lake. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Lake Mead National Recreation Area, Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads and Dolan Springs. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, then pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
